---
name: "✨ Feature request"
about: Suggest an idea that could make the project better
title: "[Feature] "
labels: ["enhancement"]
---
 
## What would you like to see?
Describe the feature in a sentence or two.
 
## Why is it useful?
Tell us the problem it solves or the improvement it brings.
 
## Anything else?
Sketches, examples, inspiration, links — anything helps.
